import React from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Profile = () => { const userAuthString = localStorage.getItem('userAuth'); const userAuth = userAuthString ? JSON.parse(userAuthString) : null; const createdAtAsDate = new Date(userAuth.userFound.createdAt); // Extracting date and time from the createdAt property const createdAtDate = createdAtAsDate.toDateString(); return (

About me

{userAuth.userFound.bio}

HELLO

I'm {userAuth.userFound.name}

Location : Mumbai
Email : {userAuth.userFound.email}
Registered On : {createdAtDate}
Mobile no : 9833924584

Latest Books

{userAuth && userAuth.userFound && userAuth.userFound.listings ? (
{userAuth.userFound.listings.map((listing) => (
{listing.images && listing.images.length > 0 ? ( ) : ( )}

{listing.title}

${listing.price}

))}
) : (

No Books Posted

)}

Wishlists

{userAuth && userAuth.userFound && userAuth.userFound.wishlists ? (
{userAuth.userFound.wishlists.map((listing) => (
0 ? listing.image[0] : "https://img.freepik.com/free-vector/opened-book-isolated-white-background_1308-78793.jpg?w=826&t=st=1704718771~exp=1704719371~hmac=0849e46e5b67647134aaad0a144391d424615d569cf3278bbc4ab6ab552a8f09"} alt={listing.title} />

{listing.title}

${listing.price}

))}
) : (

No Books Wishlisted

)}
) } export default Profile ;
